Articles.Content:
I'm trying to add some mods to a fresh install of KSP on Linux, but all the mods have no text. By that I mean that, for example, MechJeb menu in VAB is just a gray rectangle with some more gray rectangles in it that I think are supposed to be buttons. There is no text at all.

I've added just MechJeb for All and it's recommendations with CKAN.

Here is the log file: GIST
I fixed it. If anyone has the same problem, you have to install ttf-ms-fonts using your distro's package manager

Welcome to the forums and thank you for posting the answer to your own question.

Because that's a big part of why this forum is so good.

"There's no wrong questions, the only wrong is withheld answers"
